about_descrption: The platform is open to everyone who wants to learn, with no age restrictions, providing an excellent opportunity for effective home-based education.
about_heading: New way of distance learning at home
about_text_1: The Maktab.uz platform offers video lessons that cover topics included in the curriculum in an interesting way. The platform also offers the opportunity to learn modern knowledge and skills such as programming, graphic design, robotics, effective communication, leadership, and more.
contact_description: The platform is open to everyone who wants to learn, with no age restrictions, providing an excellent opportunity for effective home-based education.
contact_text: You can ask every questions about our platform or for sponsor.
pricing_description: You can choose any plan above for productivity and increase your skills several times. Buying our plan you can get support 24/7 and call to with mentor depending on your plan.
subject: Subject
teacher_absent: The teacher did not come to the lesson
faq_question_1: How to log in as a student on uyda-ta’lim.uz?
faq_answer_1: To log in as a student, click the "Login" button and enter your username and password. If you don’t have an account, click "Register" to create a new profile.
faq_answer_2: To view electronic textbooks, log in to your profile and select the "Textbooks" section. Choose the desired textbook to read online or download it.
faq_answer_3: To watch video lessons, log in to your profile and go to the "Video Lessons" section. Select the video you want and start watching.
faq_question_4: How to use the online mentor?
faq_answer_4: To use the online mentor service, log in to your profile and select the "Mentor" section. Write your questions and chat with the mentor.
login_description: We’re happy to see you again on our platform, for getting more experience please sign in on your account!
register_description: We’re looking for amazing engineers just like you! Become a part of our rockstar engineering team and skyrocket your career!
